thread.section_title: Smith & Noble Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Smith & Noble | smithandnoble.com
thread.title: Charlotte Forrester
thread.title_full: Smith & Noble reviewed by Charlotte Forrester

author: Charlotte Forrester
title: Charlotte Forrester
text:
Tania Datil really helped me out! I needed window treatments for my son's room but I just was not sure what would work in the space. I had a TON of questions and asked for lots of samples. I have been extremely busy and was having a hard time narrowing down to the exact thing I wanted and that my son would be happy with too. Tania kept in touch in a way that was totally helpful. She really helped me bring it home.
Thanks Tania!!!
